title: Strengthening CS Competencies: Gamification-Based Science Leadership Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Three or more years of practical experience in science fields and basic LMS proficiency
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design scenarios to solve complex scientific problems by incorporating gamification elements
Learners can operate peer assessment and collaboration processes using game mechanics (level-ups, reward systems)
Learners can develop three or more self-directed engagement strategies to improve learning immersion by over 20%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
